title: Oil Steady Near Four-Month High on Weak Dollar and Iran Risks
description: Oil held near a 16-week high after the dollar slumped, while traders also monitored US President Donald Trump’s threats against Iran.
content: Oil held near a 16-week high after the dollar slumped, while traders also monitored US President Donald Trump’s threats against Iran.
